qas.question: What did Sagan argue was the only was to prove the existence of God?

answers.text: the discovery that the universe is infinitely old

qas.question: What is Richard Dawkins belief about the existence of God?

answers.text: "a universe with a god would be a completely different kind of universe from one without, and it would be a scientific difference."

qas.question: What kind of difference does Dawkins believe would come from the existence of God?
Who argued that the existence of God is an empirical question?
Who stated that God was difficult both to prove or disprove?
How could science discover if there was not a creator?
How would the universe be different according to Carl Sagan?

plausible_answers.text: "a universe with a god would be a completely different kind of universe from one without, and it would be a scientific difference."

qas.question: What grounds did Carl Sagan use to explain God's existence and how it would change the universe?

plausible_answers.text: the doctrine of a Creator of the Universe

qas.question: What did Richard Dawkins believe was difficult to prove?

plausible_answers.text: the discovery that the universe is infinitely old

qas.question: What did Richard Dawkins believe could disprove the existence of a Creator?

plausible_answers.text: the existence of God is an empirical question

qas.question: What view did Carl Sagan have about the question of the existence of God?

context: Another view, advanced by <a3_0>Richard Dawkins<a3_0/>, is that <b10_0>the existence of God is an empirical question<b10_0/>, on the grounds that <a1_0><b7_0>"a universe with a god would be a completely different kind of universe from one without, and it would be <a2_0>a <b6_0>scientific difference<b6_0/><a2_0/>."<b7_0/><a1_0/> <a4_0>Carl Sagan<a4_0/> argued that <b8_0>the doctrine of a Creator of the Universe<b8_0/> was difficult to prove or disprove and that the only conceivable scientific discovery that could disprove the existence of a Creator would be <a0_0><b9_0>the discovery that <a5_0>the universe is infinitely old<b9_0/><a0_0/>.
